title: NOT ABLE TO CHANGE STATUS ON LOL
body: Is anyone else having this problem or is it only me? It will not let me change my status anymore like I was used to.

replies.body:
I'm unable to change my status. D:

Thanks for the report!
I am. It's now purple and says "RRRRIIIIIIOOOOOOOOTTTTTTT"
Our bad! This was not an intended change. We're aiming to have this fixed up as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can set your status message using the options menu in the buddy list.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotNinjaTabby,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Zv1Zgxz4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-11T22:00:53.997+0000)
>
> Our bad! This was not an intended change. We're aiming to have this fixed up as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can set your status message using the options menu in the buddy list.

Thank you! I was looking for another way to get around it, kinda funny I didn't try that. Much appreciated
This is honestly the first time a rioter comment on a problem that I am having! Thanks man! I got worried
